Axial | DevOps Engineer | New York City (NYC) | REMOTE or ONSITE | Full Time

Axial is a platform connecting and serving buyers and sellers of privately held companies. CEOs, investment bankers, private equity investors and middle market lenders join Axial to source M&A and growth capital deals and partners.

The DevOps team works with AWS, Jenkins, Docker, Ansible, Postgres, Kubernetes, Helm, Python, Go, etc to build tools enabling speed in time to market and improve availability through operational efficiency, automation, and process standardization.

See https://boards.greenhouse.io/axial/jobs/1201207 for more information and to apply.
